nodes.documentation:
@dev transfer money to the below:
20% of challenger's amount to the first winner on succeededChallenges
20% of challenger's amount to challenge group owner
10% of challenger's amount back to original challenger
50% of challenger's add to balance of contract owner
100% refund to sponsors
nodes.name: _handleFailedChallenge
